snippet: The announcement by Senator David Vitter to drop his threat of a filibuster of Gina McCarthy is good news.
abstract: Editorial welcomes announcement by Republican Sen David Vitter that he will drop filibuster threat and allow up-or-down vote on Gina McCarthy, Pres Obama's nominee to lead Environmental Protection Agency; holds McCarthy seems ideally suited to daunting task of addressing climate change; calls on her to make robust use of her authority under Clean Air Act.
lead_paragraph: The announcement by Senator David Vitter to drop his threat of a filibuster of Gina McCarthy is good news.

headline.main: The E.P.A. May Get a Boss After all
headline.print_headline: The E.P.A. May Get a Boss After all
